top10_tweets_like: I wrote some poor {dplyr}/{purrr} code that took 3 hours to run. Converted it to SQL and it ran in 20 minutes. Then rewrote it with good {dplyr} code and it ran in three minutes. Then changed again to {data.table} and it took two minutes. Rcpp next? #rstats

New @rOpenSci #rstats {drake} documentation: example Bayesian data analysis pipeline with {rstan}, + tips and tricks.
The use case fits because MCMC is expensive and you don't want to repeat yourself.
